short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: List of cities in roadtrip driving range that are 20 degrees cooler or warmer than your current location.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the newest Chrome Extension that will take your weekend getaways to the next level: "Roadtrip Weekend"!

Are you tired of spending your weekends cooped up in the same old city, with nothing but Netflix and takeout to keep you company? Do you crave adventure and exploration, but don't know where to start? Well, look no further, because "Roadtrip Weekend" has got you covered!

With just a mouse over , "Roadtrip Weekend" will show you the coolest or warmest cities near you that you can visit for a weekend getaway. Whether you want to escape the hustle and bustle of the city or explore a new culture, this extension has got you covered.

Live in Los Angeles and want to escape the smog and traffic? "Roadtrip Weekend" will suggest heading to the stunning natural wonders of Joshua Tree National Park. Looking for a cultural experience in Atlanta? "Roadtrip Weekend" will recommend visiting the historic and vibrant city of Charleston, South Carolina.

But that's not all! "Roadtrip Weekend" also comes equipped with suggestions for quirky and offbeat destinations, so you can discover hidden gems and make your trip truly unforgettable. Plus, the extension lets your book the hotel at the click of a button so you dont have to go hunting for that special deal.

So what are you waiting for? Install "Roadtrip Weekend" now and start planning your next adventure. Your epic weekend road trip awaits!
